tool_description: Validates the accuracy and consistency of database statistics by comparing current statistics with actual data samples and identifying discrepancies.

connection_id.description: Database connection identifier for validation operations

sample_size.description: Number of rows to sample for validation (1000-100000)

tolerance_percentage.description: Acceptable variance percentage for statistics accuracy (1-50)

error_messages: Invalid connection: Connection ID not found or connection closed.
Invalid validation targets: Must provide 1-50 valid schema.table names.
Invalid sample size: Sample size must be between 1000-100000.
Invalid tolerance percentage: Tolerance must be between 1-50 percent.
Access denied: Insufficient privileges to validate statistics on specified objects.
Target not found: One or more validation targets do not exist in the database.
usage: Provide connection_id and validation_targets to validate statistics accuracy. Adjust sample_size for validation depth and tolerance_percentage for acceptable variance levels.

accurate_statistics.description: Objects with accurate statistics within tolerance

inaccurate_statistics.description: Objects with statistics outside tolerance requiring updates
